metadata.title: CVE-2012-2770 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Authen::ExternalAuth extension before 0.11 for Best Practical SolutionsRT allows remote attackers to obtain a logged-in session via unspecifiedvectors related to the "URL of a RSS feed of the user."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2770` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rt4-extension-authenexternalauth - 0.10-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rt-authen-externalauth package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10-2').
